name: Flirt for Two
description: Tender and spicy challenges for new couples. Let’s see how much you like each other!

dares.title: Blind Compliment
dares.action: ${c_player}, close your eyes and give ${r_player} your most sincere compliment.

dares.title: Dance for Two
dares.action: ${c_player}, invite ${r_player} to a slow dance with no music.

dares.title: Whispered Wish
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper to ${r_player} one small romantic wish.

dares.title: 10 Seconds Eye to Eye
dares.action: Look into each other’s eyes for 10 seconds without looking away.

dares.title: Letters by Touch
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently trace the first letter of your name on ${r_player}’s back with your finger.

dares.title: Tasty Compliment
dares.action: ${c_player}, compare ${r_player} to a dessert and explain why.

dares.title: First Meeting
dares.action: Act as if you have just met each other.

dares.title: Little Secret
dares.action: ${c_player}, quietly tell ${r_player} something personal they don’t know yet.

dares.title: Tender Pause
dares.action: ${c_player}, hold ${r_player}’s hands for ${rand(10,20)} seconds while looking into their eyes.

dares.title: Romantic Advice
dares.action: ${c_player}, give ${r_player} a one-sentence romantic tip.

dares.title: Hold Me Tight
dares.action: ${c_player}, hug ${r_player} for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Sweet Nickname
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent a cute nickname for ${r_player} that they haven’t heard before.

dares.title: One Question
dares.action: ${c_player}, ask ${r_player} any romantic question you’ve always wanted answered.

dares.title: Breath of Closeness
dares.action: Bring your faces as close as possible and stay like that for 10 seconds without touching.

dares.title: Short Confession
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell ${r_player} something you’re grateful to them for.

dares.title: Smile for a Smile
dares.action: ${c_player}, try to make ${r_player} laugh using only facial expressions.

dares.title: Hands Will Tell
dares.action: ${c_player}, with eyes closed, identify ${r_player} by touching only their hands.

dares.title: Shared Future
dares.action: Take turns naming one moment you’d like to experience together.

dares.title: Story in Letters
dares.action: ${c_player}, make up a short romantic story about you and ${r_player} using the letter ${r_letter}.

dares.title: Plan for Tomorrow
dares.action: Together, invent a short romantic plan for tomorrow evening within 30 seconds.

dares.title: Secret Gaze
dares.action: ${c_player}, look at ${r_player} with the gentlest gaze for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Favorite Scent
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell ${r_player} which scent you associate with them.

dares.title: Butterfly Touch
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently touch ${r_player}’s cheek like a butterfly wing.

dares.title: Voice of the Heart
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper three words into ${r_player}’s ear that you want to say right now.

dares.title: Melody of Love
dares.action: ${c_player}, hum a tune that reminds you of ${r_player}.

dares.title: Perfect Date
dares.action: ${c_player}, briefly describe the perfect date you’d like to plan for ${r_player}.

dares.title: Hand in Hand
dares.action: Hold hands and don’t let go until the next dare.

dares.title: One Fact
dares.action: ${c_player}, name one fact about ${r_player} that especially impresses you.

dares.title: Short Declaration
dares.action: ${c_player}, make a brief but vivid declaration to ${r_player}.

dares.title: Secret Smile
dares.action: ${c_player}, smile at ${r_player} so they feel truly special.

dares.title: Gentle Massage
dares.action: ${c_player}, give ${r_player} a light shoulder massage for 20 seconds.

dares.title: One in a Million
dares.action: ${c_player}, name one trait that makes ${r_player} different from everyone else.

dares.title: Sweet Memory
dares.action: ${c_player}, briefly share the nicest moment you’ve had with ${r_player}.

dares.title: Shared Wish
dares.action: At the same time, say aloud what you both want right now.

dares.title: Favorite Sound
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell which sound or tone of ${r_player} you like most.

dares.title: Romantic Movie
dares.action: ${c_player}, choose a movie that perfectly describes your relationship with ${r_player}.

dares.title: Warm Breath
dares.action: ${c_player}, warm ${r_player}’s hands with your breath for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Letter Without Words
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently draw a heart on ${r_player}’s palm with your finger.

dares.title: One Step Closer
dares.action: Simultaneously take one step toward each other and freeze for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Perfect Evening
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell ${r_player} what your ideal evening together looks like.
